sentence: McCarthy asserted that he is largely standing by incumbents in their races, with the exception of endorsing against Wyoming Rep. Liz Cheney due to her decision to join the select committee tasked with investigating the Jan. 6 Capitol riot.
author: Juliegrace Brufke
title: Kevin McCarthy not worried about Trump endorsements in GOP primaries

sentence: More than 100 House Republicans are set to cohost a fundraiser for Harriet Hageman, the leading primary challenger against GOP Rep. Liz Cheney, according to Politico.
author: John L. Dorman
title: More than 100 House Republicans will cohost a fundraiser for Rep. Liz Cheney's leading primary challenger
